• To navigate through this demo steps, click the BACK and NEXT buttons below
  • When you go to a new step, you'll see the webpage related to the step's persona

steps.title: The demo steps list
steps.presenterContent:
• Click on the 'list' button to see the list of this demo steps
  • In the steps list popup, click on the 'Filter by persona' checkbox to see only the current persona's steps
  • Click again to see all steps
  • Click on the 'NEXT' button to go to the next step

steps.title: Changing personas
steps.presenterContent:
• Click on the current persona's picture on the top
  • Select a new persona from the list
  • You will see the webpage related to the selected persona
  • Click on the 'NEXT' button to go to the next step

steps.title: Set up demos order
steps.presenterContent:
• Click the 'Hamburger Numbered' button to see the Demos settings popup
  • Click on the checkboxes to exclude/include demos to be presented
  • Hover the items and click on the arrows on the right to change the demos order
  • Click on the 'NEXT' button to go to the next step

steps.title: Minified View
steps.presenterContent:
• Click the 'arrow' button to enter the minified view
  • Click on the persona picture on the bottom right to open the personas selector
  • When the persona selector is open, click on a persona to select it
  • Click on the 'hamburger' button to go back to the Side View
  • Click on the 'NEXT' button to go to the next step
